paper.title: Die Integration von Informationsverarbeitungsressourcen im Rahmen von Mergers & Acquisitions

author.org: A.T. Kearney GmbH, Frankfurt am Main, Deutschland
Institut für Angewandte Informatik und Formale Beschreibungsverfahren (AIFB), Universität Karlsruhe (TH), Karlsruhe, Deutschland

paper.publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
paper.abstract: Mergers u0026 acquisitions feature prominently in today’s business world. At the same time, numerous failed transactions exemplify that the integration of enterprise resources requires special management attention. As corporate value chains become ever more permeated with information technology, integration in mergers u0026 acquisitions increasingly turns into an issue of combining firms’ IT-resources.
